thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 24 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Oaktree Says Urges Ranger Board To Recommend Wind-Down Of RDL

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oaktree Says Urges Ranger Board To Recommend Wind-Down Of RDL
text:
Oaktree Capital Management:
* OAKTREE SENDS LETTER TO RANGER BOARD OF DIRECTORS REGARDING STRATEGIC REVIEW
* OAKTREE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT SAYS FUNDS MANAGED BY IT, AN 18.56% SHAREHOLDER OF RANGER DIRECT LENDING FUND, SENT A LETTER TO RANGER BOARD ON APRIL 11
* OAKTREE SAYS COME TO CONCLUSION RANGER DIRECT LENDING SHAREHOLDERS’ INTERESTS ARE BEST SERVED BY WINDING DOWN CO, RETURNING CAPITAL TO SHAREHOLDERS
* OAKTREE CAPITAL MANAGEMENT - URGES RANGER BOARD TO RECOMMEND WIND-DOWN OF RDL AS PREFERRED OPTION IN ONGOING STRATEGIC REVIEW PROCESS
* OAKTREE - WILLING TO SUPPORT RDL WIND-DOWN EFFORT BY NOMINATING UP TO 2 NONEXECUTIVE DIRECTORS TO JOIN BOARD AT RANGER’S INVITATION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
